evidence.claim: Adelphi Staffing uses AWS for cloud services.
The company implements HIPAA compliance in their data handling processes.
Adelphi Staffing focuses on secure data management practices in human resources.
Information on the types of data processed suggests potential EDI usage, although specific transaction sets are not detailed on their site.
No specific FHIR or HL7 implementations were found in the provided documentation, indicating a potential gap in health-tech integrations.
